TEXT.TITLE: WORTHEN BANKING <WOR> UNIT HEAD QUITS
TEXT.BODY: Worthen Banking Corp said G. Michael Sigman has resigned as president and chief executive officer of its First National Bank of Hot Springs subsidiary to pursue other business interests. It said James C. Patridge, executive vice president of its Worthen Bank and Trust Co subsidiary, will act as Sigman's replacement on an interim basis until a successor is found. Reuter
